data.text:
After spending time with her, there are many things I came to 
understand about Daitaku Helios, a party Uma Musume that was very 
much like the Sun. And one of those things was―
data.processed:
<story>After spending time with her, there are many things I came to 
<story>understand about Daitaku Helios, a party Uma Musume that was very 
<story>much like the Sun. And one of those things was―

data.text:
Boom boom boooo～m! 
I'll blast right through this training～～～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Boom boom boooo～m! 
<story>I'll blast right through this training～～～!!

data.text:
Motivation's a real drag, yo～…… 
life's like a dude in a speedo～～～～
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Motivation's a real drag, yo～…… 
<story>life's like a dude in a speedo～～～～

data.text:
Wei wei we～i☆ 
Keep the good vibes comin' FOOOOOO～～～～～!!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Wei wei we～i☆ 
<story>Keep the good vibes comin' FOOOOOO～～～～～!!!

data.text:
……this is usually how training went. Her mood from moment to 
moment, greatly affected how things progressed.
data.processed:
<story>……this is usually how training went. Her mood from moment to 
<story>moment, greatly affected how things progressed.

data.text:
But still, lately Daitaku Helios' condition has been pretty good. 
Seems like she's enjoying school life too, if that's the case――
data.processed:
<story>But still, lately Daitaku Helios' condition has been pretty good. 
<story>Seems like she's enjoying school life too, if that's the case――

data.text:
Nuaaaaaaa～! I've just been repeatin' that hellish training menu! 
Give me back my youthful life～～～～～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Nuaaaaaaa～! I've just been repeatin' that hellish training menu! 
<story>Give me back my youthful life～～～～～!!

data.text:
And those Limited Edition Uma Pyoi Love You Love You pancakes…… 
I thought they'd be my friends forever――
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>And those Limited Edition Uma Pyoi Love You Love You pancakes…… 
<story>I thought they'd be my friends forever――

data.text:
Wouldn't it be a real downer if someone you knew transferred 
away suddenly!? It's the same as that! For real!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Parting is such sweet sorrow, huh?
Parting is such sweet sorrow, huh?

data.processed:
<story>Wouldn't it be a real downer if someone you knew transferred 
<story>away suddenly!? It's the same as that! For real!

data.text:
Right!? 
Not good～…… haven't felt this empty in a while.
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Wanna go find something like it?

data.processed:
<story>Right!? 
<story>Not good～…… haven't felt this empty in a while.

data.text:
Hmmm～～～. But isn't that hopeless? 
It's those Awe&Some friends we're talkin' about, right?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm～～～. But isn't that hopeless? 
<story>It's those Awe&Some friends we're talkin' about, right?

data.text:
Ah, but I'll gladly take Trai-pi's heart! 
Yes-Please-And-Thank-You, Trai-poyo-check!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Ah, but I'll gladly take Trai-pi's heart! 
<story>Yes-Please-And-Thank-You, Trai-poyo-check!

data.text:
She was trying to force a smile, but it caught 
my attention…… Though to be honest, I only understood 
half of why she was depressed.
data.processed:
<story>She was trying to force a smile, but it caught 
<story>my attention…… Though to be honest, I only understood 
<story>half of why she was depressed.

data.text:
But, as Daitaku Helios' trainer, 
I had to do something to cheer her up…!
data.processed:
<story>But, as Daitaku Helios' trainer, 
<story>I had to do something to cheer her up…!

data.text: Hmm? What's up, Trai-poyo? The ceiling?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: P-party peeps should raise the roof……!

data.processed: <story>Hmm? What's up, Trai-poyo? The ceiling?

data.text:
……!! That's it, Trai-pippi…… 
I got it, loud and clear!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>……!! That's it, Trai-pippi…… 
<story>I got it, loud and clear!

data.text:
So that's what you're aimin' for! A party animal!! 
You shoulda said that sooner～～～!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>So that's what you're aimin' for! A party animal!! 
<story>You shoulda said that sooner～～～!

data.text:
You don't need to hold back～～～! Leave it to me, okay!? 
I'll turn ya in to a proper party animal!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>You don't need to hold back～～～! Leave it to me, okay!? 
<story>I'll turn ya in to a proper party animal!!

data.text:
Allllright, let's go～! 
We're gonna really let loose～～～～～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Allllright, let's go～! 
<story>We're gonna really let loose～～～～～☆

data.text:
Without giving me time to object, 
Daitaku Helios dragged me out in to the city.
data.processed:
<story>Without giving me time to object, 
<story>Daitaku Helios dragged me out in to the city.

data.text:
『Holdin' a rockin' Live, with a call 
out from the past, Come on!』
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>『Holdin' a rockin' Live, with a call 
<story>out from the past, Come on!』

data.text:
『We're livin' it up! We're livin' it up!』 
C'mon, I can't hear ya～～～～～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>『We're livin' it up! We're livin' it up!』 
<story>C'mon, I can't hear ya～～～～～!!

data.text:
Old lady! 
One honey～ MAX, Mega Size!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Old lady! 
<story>One honey～ MAX, Mega Size!

data.text:
Trai-pi, if you're a party peep, 
go for it! Poyo it! 'Kay?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Trai-pi, if you're a party peep, 
<story>go for it! Poyo it! 'Kay?

data.text:
No way～～～～～～!? Trai-pi, you're a pro! 
Grabbin' two at the same time is crazy! Bring 'em in, go-!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>No way～～～～～～!? Trai-pi, you're a pro! 
<story>Grabbin' two at the same time is crazy! Bring 'em in, go-!!

data.text:
―Hey, they fell! Ahahahaa!! 
No choice but to go for three next, huh?!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>―Hey, they fell! Ahahahaa!! 
<story>No choice but to go for three next, huh?!

data.text:
Uwahahahaa! It's already evening! 
Anyways, good work today～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Uwahahahaa! It's already evening! 
<story>Anyways, good work today～☆

data.text:
Got that right☆ Soon, I'll make a party animal out of you! 
We'll max out those vibes, Bwaan bwaa～n!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Got that right☆ Soon, I'll make a party animal out of you! 
<story>We'll max out those vibes, Bwaan bwaa～n!

data.text:
Speaking of that, Trai-pi, since you've barely debuted, 
let's keep this goin'! Drop me a LANE anytime! Okay?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Speaking of that, Trai-pi, since you've barely debuted, 
<story>let's keep this goin'! Drop me a LANE anytime! Okay?

data.text: Next time I'll take ya to a real Awe&Some party☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>Next time I'll take ya to a real Awe&Some party☆

data.text:
In the end, she still thought I wanted to become 
a party peep, but since she seemed to be feeling 
better, I was alright with this result.
data.processed:
<story>In the end, she still thought I wanted to become 
<story>a party peep, but since she seemed to be feeling 
<story>better, I was alright with this result.

data.text:
Understanding more about partying would probably make 
it easier to keep her motivation up. ……And maybe aiming 
to be a party peep wouldn't be so bad.
data.processed:
<story>Understanding more about partying would probably make 
<story>it easier to keep her motivation up. ……And maybe aiming 
<story>to be a party peep wouldn't be so bad.
